title: Champions during rotation
body: I am new to the game so please bare with me! I can play as the rotation champions but I would rather play as default so I don't get used to a champion I soon can't use. I am unsure how to play as the default champions during these rotations. Any help please?!

replies.body:
I think you mean the special rotation of champs for low-level summoners (below 6). Since you're over 6 now, you shouldn't be seeing that rotation any longer.

Let me know if you have any questions.
